notam.notam_body: A3204/21 NOTAMR A1601/14 Q) LOVV/QOBCE/IV/B /A /000/999/4639N01420E005 A) LOWK B) 2111251134 C) PERM E) MAROLLA - RADIO MAST ERECTED AT PSN 463907,9N 0141922,6E - TOP OF OBST ABOVE MSL: 506,79M/1663FT - OBST DAY MARKED AND LIGHTED. ELEV: 478,49M/1570FT - HGT ABOVE GND: 28,30M/93FT. REF AIP AUSTRIA, LOWK AD 2 MAP 5-1

A0512/22 NOTAMN Q) LOVV/QFAXX/IV/NBO/A /000/999/4807N01634E005 A) LOWW B) 2203270000 C) 2206241500 EST E) REF AIP AUSTRIA LOWW AD 2-47 ITEM 2.2 THE FOLLOWING TIMES ARE CURRENTLY CONSIDERED IN LOWW AS RUSH HOURS: 0600-0800 0900-1030 1400-1500 1600-1800 1900-2100

A0668/22 NOTAMN Q) LOVV/QPFCH/IV/NBO/AE/000/999/4807N01634E005 A) LOWW B) 2204050900 C) 2206241000 EST E) VIENNA SCHWECHAT AIRPORT WILL GO INTO PERMANENT A-CDM OPERATIONS TRANSMITTING DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (DPI) MESSAGES FOR ALL DEPARTING IFR TRAFFIC TO NETWORK MANAGEMENT OPERATIONS CENTRE (NMOC). NMOC WILL TAKE LOCAL TARGET TAKE-OFF TIMES INTO ACCOUNT FOR FLOW MANAGEMENT PURPOSES. THIS WILL ALLOW FOR MORE ACCURATE AND EFFICIENT CALCULATION OF THE CTOT (WHEN APPLICABLE) DUE TO THE USE OF LOCAL TARGET TAKE-OFF TIMES. THE BASIC NMOC PROCEDURES CONTINUE TO APPLY. ALL IFR FLIGHTS DEPARTING LOWW WILL BE AFFECTED AND SHALL ADHERE CLOSELY TO LOCAL AIRPORT COLLABORATIVE DECISION MAKING (A-CDM) PRODEDURES.

A0675/22 NOTAMR A0673/22 Q) LOVV/QFGXX/IV/NBO/AE/000/999/4807N01634E005 A) LOWW B) 2203281137 C) PERM E) TO AVOID DELAYS, DEPARTING AIRBUS A220 / BOMBARDIER C-SERIES OPERATORS ARE OBLIGED TO INFORM ATC ON INITIAL CONTACT IF CURRENT WIND SITUATION PROHIBITS ENGINE STARTUP DURING OR AFTER PUSHBACK. ENGINE STARTUP AT THE GATE HAS TO BE CONSIDERED AND COORDINATED PRIOR INITIATING PUSHBACK.

A1452/22 NOTAMR A1450/22 Q) LFEE/QPNCH/IV/NBO/A /000/999/4735N00732E005 A) LFSB B) 2204140906 C) 2207142359 E) NOISE ABATEMENT PROCEDURES - NEW RESTRICTIONS : -NO CHAPTER 3 AIRCRAFT WHOSE CUMULATIVE MARGIN IS LESS THAN 13 EPNDB MAY : -LAND OR PUSH BACK BETWEEN 2000 AND 2200 -LAND BETWEEN 0300 AND 0400. REGARDLESS OF ITS CUMULATIVE MARGIN. -NO AIRCRAFT MAY CARRY OUT A SCHEDULED DEPARTURE BETWEEN 2100 AND 2200 EXCEPT FOR COMMERCIAL FLIGHTS DELAYED FOR REASONS BEYOND THE CONTROL OF THE CARRIER. -THE AIR CARRIER WILL PROVIDE WITHIN 48HR TO THE CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITIES THE DETAILS OF THE REASONS FOR THE DELAY OF THE FLIGHTS OPERATED. -ANY REFERENCE TO A DEPARTURE TIME SHALL BE UNDERSTOOD AS A PUSHBACK TIME FROM THE ACFT STAND. -REF : AD2 LFSB AD 2.21 AUGUST 06 2021 DECREE.

A2382/22 NOTAMN Q) LFEE/QFALT/IV/NBO/A /000/999/4735N00732E005 A) LFSB B) 2206120300 C) 2206182000 E) AD RESTRICTIONS FOR AIRPLANES : RISK OF SATURATION OF MAIN PARKING AREA. MANDATORY HANDLING FOR ALL REGULAR OR NON REGULAR FLIGHTS, TAXI FLIGHTS OR GENERAL AVIATION. DAY AND NIGHT STOP FORBIDDEN ON MAIN APRON. PROMOTIONAL EVENT AREA OPERATIONAL BTN 0600 AND 1800. 'ART BASEL' TRAFFIC PROHIBITED OUTSIDE THESE HOURS. STOP-OVER LIMITED TO ONE HOUR EXCEPT FOR STATE FLIGHTS, EMERGENCY LANDING AND MEDEVAC. PARKING ON PRIVATE AREAS TO BE NEGOCIATED DIRECTLY WITH MAINTENANCE AREA USERS (AMAC, JET AVIATION, ASB, NOMAD, NOVARTIS, GAC) ACCESS PROHIBITED TO NON-BASED VFR, EXCEPT 'ART BASEL' TRAFFIC. HANDLING COMPANIES : SWISSPORT : TEL 0033(0)389902385 EMAIL : BSL.SERVICES(AT)SWISSPORT.COM SITA : BSLOBXH AIR SERVICE BASEL : TEL 0041615673700 FAX 0041615673701 EMAIL : FBO(AT)AIRSERVICEBASEL.COM
